metadata.title: RA4E2, RA6E2: Small package with USB interface

sections.content:
Question:
Looking for a small package MCU that supports the USB interface.
Answer:
The RA4E2 and RA6E2 support a 4 mm x 4 mm 36-pin BGA package and so are the smallest RA MCUs that support the USB 2.0 full-speed interface.
Suitable Products
RA4E2, RA6E2
Looking for a small package MCU that supports the USB interface.
